name: Featured Image Reminder
author: Aaron B. Hockley

sections.description:
Featured Image Reminder came about because some forgetful blogger (me) had a site where featured images were important and he kept publishing blog posts without the featured image being prepared.

When the plugin is installed and activated, and you try to publish a post without a featured image, a dialog box will appear asking if you really want to do that.

Credits

  • Inspired by the Publish Confirmation plugin.
  • Plugin repository banner includes a photo from Flickr user tiff_ku1, used under Creative Commons licensing
sections.installation:
1. Upload featured-image-reminder.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Featured Image Reminder will display a confirmation dialog box if you press the Publish button and the post doesn't have a featured image.
